description: Bantamweight Caolan Loughran will face Nathan Fletcher at the UFC's Fight Night event in London on 22 March.
title: UFC London: Caolan Loughran to face Nathan Fletcher at O2 Arena
title_page: UFC London: Caolan Loughran to face Nathan Fletcher at O2 Arena  - BBC Sport
maintext:
Bantamweight Caolan Loughran will face Nathan Fletcher at UFC London on 22 March.
Tyrone fighter Loughran has not fought since his defeat by Jake Hadley at UFC 304 in July.
Loughran, 28, has a 9-2 record since turning professional in 2019, while Englishman Hadley is 9-1 and won his last fight against Zygimantas Ramaska in September.
The UFC announced its return to London in November. The show will take place at the O2 Arena.
It is the organisation's first event in the UK since Britain's Leon Edwards lost his welterweight title to Belal Muhammad at UFC 304 in Manchester in July 2024.
The UFC last held an event in London in July 2023.
Two further fights - Lone'er Kavanagh v Felipe dos Santos and Jai Herbert v Chris Padilla - were also announced on Tuesday.
Last month, it was confirmed undefeated British heavyweight Mick Parkin will face Poland's Marcin Tybura on the card, while Poland's Jan Blachowicz and New Zealand's Carlos Ulberg will feature in a light-heavyweight bout.
